title: Significant Humanitarian Support
description: In 2021, Fiji received $500,000 in net official flows from UN agencies, specifically the Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF). This financial support highlights the international community's commitment to assisting Fiji in times of need.

title: Low Prevalence of HIV Among Children
description: As of 2022, there are 100 children aged 0-14 living with HIV in Fiji. This relatively low number reflects the country's efforts in managing and preventing the spread of HIV among its younger population.
